Hey, if you a fan of puzzle games and need some a new style. We promise you will love this puzzle game. Block Defender. It will help you to train your mind and relax. Itâ€™s based on how you are smart to build the blocks defense and reach the highest score.

INTRODUCTION
Play Block Merge & Defense on your Google Chrome Browser with our simple & lightweight extension - No Internet required, no ADS, and 100% Free!

HOW TO INSTALL?
1. Click "Add to Chrome" to install the extension
2. Pin the Block Merge & Defense extension icon to the Chrome toolbar
3. Click the Block Merge & Defense icon on the Chrome toolbar, the Block Merge & Defense popup will open. 
That's all you need to do! Have fun!

You also can play more game from the top-left menu


HOW TO PLAY?
Merge & defense
